comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: William Draper Lewis (1867–1949) was the first full-time dean of the University of Pennsylvania Law School (1896-1914) and the founding director (1923-1947) of the American Law Institute. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Draper_Lewis

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thanks for the information about William Draper Lewis.  We will add some of it to the description when we update.

comment.author: 97533501@N00
comment._content: In 1914, he was the "Roosevelt Progressive" candidate for Governor of Pennsylvania.
